alert.note: Alert for San Luis Valley Including Alamosa, Del Norte, Fort Garland, Saguache; Southern Front Range Including Sangre De Cristo Mountains, Wet Mountains, La Veta Pass; Teller County, Rampart Range Including Pikes Peak and Florissant Fossil Beds National Monument (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 12 at 6:35AM MDT until April 12 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Red Flag Warning now in effect until 8 PM today for very strong winds and low humidity values for fire weather zones 222, and 226 through 230, which includes El Paso, Pueblo, Fremont, Huerfano, and western Las Animas Counties... ...Red Flag Warning remains in effect from 11 AM to 8 PM today for very strong winds and low humidity values for fire weather zones 221, 224, 225, and 231 through 237, which includes portions of the southeast plains, Teller County, the southeast mountains, and the San Luis Valley... ...Fire Weather Watch remains in effect for Wednesday afternoon and evening for strong winds and low humidity value for fire weather zones 227, 228, and 230 through 237 which includes most of the plains in southeast Colorado. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR VERY STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 221...224 AND 225... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 221...224 and 225. * Winds...West 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 80 mph. * Timing...11 AM TO 8 PM MDT Tuesday. * Relative Humidity...As low as 18 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: San Luis Valley Including Alamosa, Del Norte, Fort Garland, Saguache; Southern Front Range Including Sangre De Cristo Mountains, Wet Mountains, La Veta Pass; Teller County, Rampart Range Including Pikes Peak and Florissant Fossil Beds National Monument
